name: Blanka private label beauty & skincare products app for WooCommerce
author: Blanka

sections.description:
Start your own branded product line in minutes with Blanka’s print-on-demand dropshipping plugin.

Blanka is an app that let’s anyone start their own branded cosmetics and skincare line in under 5 minutes.
With hundreds of high-quality North American made products to choose from, you can customize products on-demand
and dropship them straight to your end customers. Simply upload your logo, add products to your online store,
and start selling!

Getting started with Blanka is easy! Here is how it works:

  1. Download and install Blanka’s WordPress Plugin
  2. Create an account with Blanka
  3. View Blanka’s collection of high-quality products
  4. Order samples
  5. Upload your logo to see what it looks like on products
  6. Add products to your WooCommerce store
  7. Receive orders for your branded products on your WooCommerce store
  8. Fulfill orders on your Blanka dashboard
  9. Blanka will print and ship the order to your end customer

With WooCommerce & Blanka, you get:

  • No minimums: Sell as little (or as much!) as you want, with no minimums
  • North American made: Our products are manufactured locally, with high-quality, sustainable, cruelty-free ingredients
  • Best-in-class support: Our team is always here to help you run your business
  • Stress-free shipping: We offer shipping methods with tracking
  • Branded inserts: Include a thank you card or other branded inserts in your customer orders
  • Warehousing services: Order inventory upfront to speed up fulfillment. We will store it at our warehouse for freeLogo visualizer: Our logo visualizer lets you upload your logo and instantly see what it looks like on products
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin files and upload to your site
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click ‘Blanka’
sections.faq:
What is private labeling?

As a merchant, you can control how the packaging and the branding looks on a private label product.
The product is manufactured by Blanka so merchants won’t have upfront costs to design and create a com

What is dropshipping?

Dropshipping is a fulfillment method where the supplier (Blanka!) ships product
orders directly to customers. Merchants never have to hold inventory.

sections.reviews:
Excellent customer service

By e_skincare (emuneskincare) on January 25, 2023

If I could give Blanka 100 stars I would...I highly recommend Blanka to anyone looking to launch a new brand, increase their product line or needs a new PL to work with. Blanka's customer service is EXTRAORDINARY and should be emulated by other PL brands. Anytime I have an issue during nonbusiness hours, Blanka responds immediately the following day...To be clear our issues are always unrelated to Blanka and usually a result of an internal change. We have never had issues on Blanka's side.. Blanka goes above and beyond whenever we run into technical difficulties on our hosting side, logo changes etc. We signed up for Blanka about a year before our launch date which resulted in a lot of changes on our end (logo, platform etc) Blanka has remained flexible to our changes, and willing to assist whenever we needed assistance. In regard to the products, Blanka's prices are lower than almost all of the other private labels and also doesn't require high or any MOQs like other companies. We have been unable to find products more cost effective than Blanka without committing to 10K MOQs or each item. Not only does this allow us to budget towards marketing and other brand costs to help us grow, it also takes the headache of having to plan logistics and distribution to customers. There are only a handful of PLD companies but none have the customer service and brand selection like Blanka. The few competitors they do have charge twice as much out of pocket costs and many have nonexistent customer service. Blanka has a huge product line and constantly adding more products to the already large selection, the integration between Blanka and selling platform is seamless, and an all around fantastic experience.

Smart way to be an entrepreneur

By ritvikminhas28 on December 15, 2022

Superb customer service, amazing products, easy to navigate user interface. I love this company. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who has an entrepreneurial vision of starting their own private label beauty brand.

The perfect app for my side hustle!

By bigtshouse on December 2, 2022

I found this app searching for a company that could help me sell beauty products on my store. They do everything and make it super easy for me to have my own makeup line. The support team is really helpful and I'm blown away by the quality of the products.
